author: mturk
msg: Initialize log file before initializing JK, so that we can see error

author: mturk
msg: Re-open a global log mutex lock in a child process.
This function must be called to maintain portability, even
if the underlying lock mechanism does not require it.

author: mturk
msg: Add simpe Echo server with pollset for nonblocking
call after the first message is read.
